```{r}
#upload herbarium data
library(readr)
HerbariumData <- read_csv("HerbariumData.csv")
```

```{r}
#Run regression (controlling for lat, long, and flowering state)
library(tidyverse)
library(car)
#make phenophase a factor instead of character to be compared
HerbariumData_test <-
  HerbariumData %>%
  mutate(Phenophase = as.factor(Phenophase)) 

#create a date of collection variable
HerbariumData_test <-
HerbariumData %>%
  mutate(collection_date = as.Date(paste(Year, Month, Day, sep = "-")),
         julian_date = yday(HerbariumData_test$collection_date),
         Latitude = as.numeric(Latitude))

names(HerbariumData_test)[3]<- "Phenophase_detail"

HerbariumData_fl <-
  HerbariumData_test %>%
  filter(Phenophase == "fl")

#run linear regression
model_fl <- lm(julian_date ~ Phenophase_detail + Latitude + Longitude + Year, data = HerbariumData_fl)
Anova(model_fl)

```
